title: Doing the bus stop
brief_description: A safety education program using song and dance routines pitched at 8-12 year olds, to demonstrate safe behaviour on and around buses in the country and city. Hale, a “radical” driver, takes Tess on a mystery tour to illustrate vital skills which will ensure the safety of children who use public transport.
